Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2008 05:43AM Lilly50 wrote: hi to all you beautifil ladies and UB,2 weeks ago i was recalled from a routine mamo and thankfully,my problem turned out to be B9,however,in the days i was waiting and worrying about my results,i found this thread and started to read from page 1. Over these past 2 weeks,i've come to know you all so well,i've laughed,cried,waited with baited breath on your results,i've shared in your joy at the good times and have worried along with you all in the times of pain. I thank you all for giving me the opportunity to know each and every one of you and i think your all an inspiration to anyone that visits this site...i hope when you all meet up in Oz,you'll have the time of your lives. Best wishes to everyone xxxx
Posts.Title: please help sueps barbe1958

Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2008 05:27AM - edited Apr 24, 2008 05:27AM by Lilly50 thank you so much for the warm welcome ladies and its an honor to join you all in this great thread,i honestly don't know how i would've coped without it in the days i was waiting for my results. after i got the all clear,i was around 30 pages into this and when i came home from the hospital,i deleted the thread from my bookmarks...only to add it again an hour later as by that time,i felt i knew you all and i wanted to be with you all in your journey to good health. All you ladies here have helped me understand this horrible Bootface,the types,the treatment and emotions thats attached to it,before my recall,BC was a condition i didn't want to know about but now that i'm more informed,i feel more confident in speaking about it to a couple of ladies i know thats going though what your going through. Sue,i live near Sunderland which isn't that far from you,in the cold northeast lol. all my best to you wonderful girls and once again,thanks for being here xxx
